subject: Design cross-app sync protocol
body: Design the SiYuan ↔ IES Reader sync protocol. Review docs/plans/2025-12-06-cross-app-sync-design.md if it exists. Define: 1) What state needs syncing (journey breadcrumbs, reading position, sparks). 2) Sync mechanism (polling vs websocket vs shared Redis). 3) Conflict resolution. Post design summary when done.
